Detailed Description

template<class Type, int len>
class RODOS::SyncFifo< Type, len >

A synchronized fifo.

Like Fifo, but it provides syncPut which block if the fifo is full and syncRead which block if the fifo is empty. Each function may have a timeout. If no timeout is given, or timeout == 0 it will wait util the fifo is not empty/full. Warning: Only for one writer and one reader. If more than that is required it has to be protected using semaphores.
